titles.title: Approving the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment with respect to the products of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 107-198.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 116.

action.text: Consideration initiated by previous order of the House.
Considered by previous order of the House.
DEBATE - Pursuant to a previous order, the House proceeded with 2 hours of debate on H.J. Res. 51.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 154.

action.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by motion.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay. 88 - 12. Record Vote Number: 291.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/5/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Approves the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
